name: fortigate-firewall_Health
label: Fortinet FortiGate
description: Fortinet FortiGate enterprise firewall provide high performance, consolidated advanced security and granular visibility for broad protection across the entire digital attack surface.

fields.title: Hostname
fields.name: address
fields.tooltip: For HTTP you can give value http://192.168.X.X, And for HTTPS you can give value https://192.168.X.X or 192.168.X.X

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.tooltip: API Key of the Fortinet FortiGate endpoint server to connect and perform the automated operations. You can get the API key from the administration settings in FortiGate. To create a REST API key from Fortinet FortiGate, see the, connector documentation.

fields.title: Port
fields.name: port
fields.tooltip: Port number used for connecting to the Fortinet FortiGate server. Defaults to 443.

fields.title: Web Filter Profile Name
fields.name: url_block_policy
fields.tooltip: Name of the Web Filter Profile that you have specified on Fortinet FortiGate for blocking or unblocking IP addresses.

fields.title: Application Control Profile Name
fields.name: app_block_policy
fields.tooltip: Name of the Application Control Profile that you have specified on Fortinet FortiGate for blocking or unblocking IP addresses.

fields.title: VDOM
fields.name: vdom
fields.tooltip: Provide VDOM CSV or List format, if VDOM mode enabled. These used for actions related to IP addresses

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.

operations.title: Get Applications Detail
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all application names and associated details from the Fortinet FortiGate server.
Retrieves a list of IP Addresses that are blocked on Fortinet FortiGate.
operations.title: Get Blocked IP Addresses

Policy Based.title: Policy Name
Policy Based.name: ip_block_policy
Policy Based.description: Specify the name of the policy specified on Fortinet FortiGate for blocking or unblocking IP addresses and whose associated list of blocked IP addresses to retrieve from Fortinet FortiGate. Based on our example, enter FortiSOAR_Blocked_Policy in this field. See the Blocking or Unblocking IP addresses, URLs, or applications on Fortinet FortiGate section.
Policy Based.tooltip: Specify the name of the policy specified on Fortinet FortiGate for blocking or unblocking IP addresses and whose associated list of blocked IP addresses to retrieve from Fortinet FortiGate.

Policy Based.title: Address Group Name
Policy Based.name: ip_group_name
Policy Based.tooltip: Specify the name of the IP address group, in CSV("1.1.1.1", "2.2.2.2") or list(["1.1.1.1", "2.2.2.2"]) specified on Fortinet FortiGate for blocking or unblocking IP addresses.
Policy Based.description: Specify the name of the IP address group, in CSV("1.1.1.1", "2.2.2.2") or list(["1.1.1.1", "2.2.2.2"]) specified on Fortinet FortiGate for blocking or unblocking IP addresses. Based on our example, enter default in this field. See the Blocking or Unblocking IP addresses, URLs, or applications on Fortinet FortiGate section.

Policy Based.title: NGFW Mode
Policy Based.name: ngfw_mode
Policy Based.tooltip: Specify the next-generation firewall(NGFW) mode of the VDOM where the specified policy is present on Fortinet FortiGate for blocking or unblocking IP addresses.
Policy Based.description: Specify the next-generation firewall(NGFW) mode of the VDOM where the specified policy is present on Fortinet FortiGate for blocking or unblocking IP addresses. You can choose from following options: Profile Based, Policy Based. By default it is Profile Based.

parameters.title: VDOM
parameters.name: vdom
parameters.tooltip: Specify the VDOMs whose associated list of blocked IP addresses is to be retrieved from Fortinet FortiGate. NOTE: The VDOM value that you specify in this field overwrites the VDOM(s) values that you have specified in the Configuration Parameters while configuring this connector.

operations.title: Get Blocked Applications
operations.description: Retrieves a list of application names that are blocked on Fortinet FortiGate.

parameters.title: VDOM
parameters.name: vdom
parameters.tooltip: This VDOM overwrites configuration VDOM list. Provide only a single value of VDOM if VDOM mode enabled. Ensure specified VDOM has "Application Control Profile Name" exists to execute an action.

operations.title: Get Blocked URLs
operations.description: Retrieves a list of URLs that are blocked on Fortinet FortiGate.

parameters.title: VDOM
parameters.name: vdom
parameters.tooltip: This VDOM overwrites the configuration VDOM list. Provide only a single value of VDOM if VDOM mode enabled. Ensure specified VDOM has "Web  Filter Profile Name" exists to execute an action.

operations.title: Block IP Address (Deprecated)
operations.description: Blocks IP addresses on Fortinet FortiGate using the IPv4 Block Policy that you have specified as the "action" parameter of Fortinet FortiGate or by Quarantine based- adds IP into the banned IP list. For more information see the Blocking or Unblocking IP addresses, URLs, or applications on Fortinet FortiGate section. IMPORTANT: This operation has been retained to avoid failures of existing playbooks that use this action. Use the new Block IP Address action for new playbooks.

parameters.title: Block Method
parameters.name: method
parameters.tooltip: Specify the method to be used for blocking IP addresses using Fortinet FortiGate.

Quarantine Based.title: IP Addresses
Quarantine Based.name: ip_addresses
Quarantine Based.tooltip: Specify the IP addresses that you want to block using Fortinet FortiGate, in the "CSV" or "list" format.
Quarantine Based.description: Specify the IP addresses to block using Fortinet FortiGate in CSV("1.1.1.1", "2.2.2.2") or list(["1.1.1.1", "2.2.2.2"]) format.

Quarantine Based.title: Time to Live
Quarantine Based.name: time_to_live

Custom Time.title: Time to Live
Custom Time.name: duration
Custom Time.tooltip: User must specify the Time to Live in seconds. If you specified 0 then ip will be banned for indefinite time.
Custom Time.description: Specify a value, in seconds, in the Time to Live field.

Quarantine Based.tooltip: Specify the time period till IP addresses will remain in the Block status. If you select Never then ip will be banned for indefinite time.
Quarantine Based.description: Specify the time till when the IP addresses are blocked. You can choose between the following options: 1 Hour, 6 Hour, 12 Hour, 1 Day, 6 Months, 1 Year, Custom.
